title: DraftKings Releases Prediction Markets App
description: DraftKings is releasing a new app that will allow customers to trade contracts on sports and financial events through prediction markets. Bloomberg's Ira Boudway discusses the story on "Bloomberg Markets" with Scarlet Fu. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: DraftKings is releasing a new app that will allow customers to trade contracts on sports and financial events through prediction markets. Bloomberg's Ira Boudway discusses the story on "Bloomberg Markets" with Scarlet Fu. (Source: Bloomberg)
